channel.title: CFB on Chase Stubbs' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CFB on Chase Stubbs' Blog

item.title: Who Had The Better QB Draft Class? 2020 or 2021?
item.description: In the NFL, 32 teams play 16 games in 17 weeks for the chance to play in the Super Bowl. That means that a full NFL season, from preseason to Super Bowl, is roughly seven months. Teams donâ€™t just compete during this time frame though. The real work for the Lombardi Trophy begins after the Super Bowl. The offseason is my favorite part of football. I love the idea of building a team through a draft, recruiting, or free agency.
